    Platform for promoting Indian astronomy research to the public.

    Useful links

    Useful links

    A lot of data and softwares are available publicly for free. Be it the database from the Sloan Digital Sky Surey, to the upcoming facilites, a lot of data and the tools to acces them are publicly available nowadays. We just attach links to a few of them, so that interested people may keep a track of them. Of course, members of the CosmicVarta team use a lot of these sofawres and databases on a uusal basis, toards their Ph.D degrees! If you have any problem, you may ask us through the forms available in the contact section, or even in the comments section below.

    1. SDSS

    2. GAIA

    NED-databases

    SIMBAD

    SIMBAD is used to search for any object in the sky. Please go through this article about how to use SIMBAD.

    How to search for any location using SIMBAD?
